abstract.para:
Note: This document lists changes only since the 1.77.1 release. If you instead want a record of the complete list of changes for the codebase over its entire history, you can obtain one by running the following commands:
svn checkout https://docbook.svn.sourceforge.net/svnroot/docbook/trunk/xsl svn log --xml --verbose xsl > ChangeHistory.xml

sect1.title: Release Notes: 1.78.0
sect1.para: The following is a list of changes that have been made since the 1.77.1 release.

sect2.title: Gentext
sect2.para: The following changes have been made to the gentext code since the 1.77.1 release.

screen.phrase: Bug #3556630: Updated nb and nn locale files.
Bug #3556628: Updated information in README.
Added keycap context from RFE#3540451 to support @function attribute
Added keycap context from RFE#3540451 to support @function attribute
Add support for title element in screenshot, now allowed in DocBook 5.

sect2.title: Common
sect2.para: The following changes have been made to the common code since the 1.77.1 release.

screen.phrase: Corrected template for bridgehead in mode="title.markup" to process its children in normal mode.
Convert hard wired xsl:number for production into a template with mode="label.markup" to be consistent with other element numbering.
Remove all references and code for obsolete olink attributes @linkmode @targetdocent and @localinfo.
Add parameter 'activate.external.olinks' to allow making external olinks inactive, as for epub output.

sect2.title: FO
sect2.para: The following changes have been made to the fo code since the 1.77.1 release.

screen.phrase: Change initial page number for book from 1 to auto so front cover and title pages are sequential, and so that book inside set will continue numbering.
Add missing closing tag for xsl:choose in new template.
Add force.blank.pages parameter to allow turning off blank pages in double.sided output.
Implement active links between co and callout elements for PDF output, linking in both directions.
Fix typo to replace "ro" with "row" in three places.
Convert hard wired xsl:number for production into a template with mode="label.markup" to be consistent with other element numbering.
Make comma inserted after function/parameter or function/replaceable conditional on $function.parens to be consistent with the function template.

Added new inline.sansseq template for consistency reasons. Makes it easier for customization layers: Just use <xsl:call-template name="inline.sansseq"/> to change to sans serif font, but also takes into account XLinks and direction of text.
Remove all references and code for obsolete olink attributes @linkmode @targetdocent and @localinfo.
Remove passivetex.extensions code.

para.literal: Robert Stayton: spaces.xsl; autotoc.xsl; docbook.xsl; division.xsl; table.xsl; sections.xs⋯

screen.phrase: Remove all passivetex code because it is obsolete.
Add parameter 'activate.external.olinks' to allow making external olinks inactive, as for epub output.
Added support for keep-together PI on informaltable. Closes bug #3555609.
Fixed subtle typo when calling lastLineNumber template: must be $listing instead of listing
Fixed typo: fole -> role attribute for phrase

Added support for @function attribute in keycap (uses keycap context from language files) => fixes RFE#3540451 If @function is set and keycap is empty, then template will use the content from the keycap context, otherwise it will use just the given text
Add support for title element in screenshot, now allowed in DocBook 5.
Restore formatting of figure/caption that was broken in 1.77.1.

sect2.title: HTML
sect2.para: The following changes have been made to the html code since the 1.77.1 release.

screen.phrase: Fixing bug where toc.title.p and nodes params had not been declared inside manual-toc template
Add 'toc.list.attributes' template to insert class and other attributes on the top level list element in a table of contents.
Fix bug 3590039 abstract/title not rendered.
Fixed positioning of footnote separate when CSS decoration is used.
Convert hard wired xsl:number for production into a template with mode="label.markup" to be consistent with other element numbering.
Make comma inserted after function/parameter or function/replaceable conditional on $function.parens to be consistent with the function template.
Add support for mediaobject/alt, with precedence over mediaobject/textobject/phrase.
Remove src:fragref elements for deleted obsolete olink params.
Fix bug #3563697 where template make-relative-filename was using a global param chunk.base.dir instead of its local param base.dir. Now it uses base.dir.
Remove all references and code for obsolete olink attributes @linkmode @targetdocent and @localinfo.
Add parameter 'activate.external.olinks' to allow making external olinks inactive, as for epub output.
Add hook for customization.
Splitting head.content into smaller chunks of templates. See https://lists.oasis-open.org/archives/docbook-apps/201209/msg00037.html
Fixed subtle typo when calling lastLineNumber template: must be $listing instead of listing
Fix bug in footnote link introduced in 1.77.1.
Resolve conflict of duplicate ids on html table with caption. Wrap a div with class and id attribute around html table without caption.
Remove call to 'generate.id' template in <h1> in component.title because the id is already generated for the parent div element.
Set omit-xml-declaration to 'yes' for write.text.chunk template, since a text file should never have an xml declaration.

Added support for @function attribute in keycap (uses keycap context from language files) => fixes RFE#3540451 If @function is set and keycap is empty, then template will use the content from the keycap context, otherwise it will use just the given text
Also set the title param in head.content since it's sometimes called without that param being passed in. Use the passed-in value in user.head.title.
Restore missing title param on 'head.content' template, and passed it along to user.head.title. That param is used for certain special chunkings such as Long Descriptions.
Add support for title in screenshot, available since DocBook 5.
HTML: Add hook for easily customizing html/head/title

sect2.title: Manpages
sect2.para: The following changes have been made to the manpages code since the 1.77.1 release.

screen.phrase: Add a line break at start of variablelist to fix bug #3595156.
Better fix for bug #3545150 by putting the title with the step number rather than before it.
Add 'content' param to template name inline.monoseq to support email format, fixing bug #3524417.
Fix bug #3512473 where an inline synopsis element produced an extra line break in nroff output.
Fix bug 3545150 where procedure/step/title not rendered in man pages.

sect2.title: Roundtrip
sect2.para: The following changes have been made to the roundtrip code since the 1.77.1 release.

screen.phrase: Fix bug #3297553 error in Word metadata elements from including WordML markup instead of just text.

sect2.title: Slides
sect2.para: The following changes have been made to the slides code since the 1.77.1 release.

screen.phrase: - Use real push-style processing in the foil/foilgroup page content, which allows better customization in general (e.g. you can add PI templates) and also let us render scattered speakernotes/handoutnotes if that is desired
- Titlepage markup belongs to the XHTML namespace
- Remove now unnecessary template redefinition
- Generate valid links from cross-references
- Do not add fallbacks for EXSLT extensions, the main DocBook XSL stylesheets do not do that either
Update the import path for docbook.rnc after the slides directory was moved.
Add missing stylesheet.
Adjust Makefiles.
